title: Robot falcon puts the frighteners on nuisance birds
text:
Robot falcon puts the frighteners on nuisance birds 11:32am BST - 01:54
A robotic bird of prey that mimics the flight of a real peregrine falcon has been developed by a spin-off company from the University of Twente to help tackle the problem of bird strikes at airports. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A robotic bird of prey that mimics the flight of a real peregrine falcon has been developed by a spin-off company from the University of Twente to help tackle the problem of bird strikes at airports. Matthew Stock reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2L9gGRv
